options.name: Free Action : Spell Surge
options.description: After Channeling a Spell that has a Channel Time of 1 Action and has an Attack Roll, amplify it with a surge of magic increasing your Check by 1d4. In the event you roll a 1, you roll on the Surge Table which alters your Spell.

options.name: Charging Surge
options.description: When you use your Spell Surge, the Spell becomes automatically Charged on a d4 roll of 4.

options.name: Violent Surge
options.description: When you use your Spell Surge, you double your Damage Bonus Modifier on the Spell on any roll besides a 1 on the d4.

options.name: Reaction : Empowering Surge
options.description: After a Creature within 10 Units Channels a Spell with a Channel Type of 1 Action, you amplify it with a surge of magic increasing your Check by 1d4. In the event you roll a 1, you roll on the Surge Table which alters your Spell.
